alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 4:49PM CST until March 02 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Choctaw County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 448 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of Bennington, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Goodland... Grant... Ord... Gay... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Oklahoma. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
